title: A treatise of the figures of grammer and rhetorike profitable for al that be studious of eloquence, and in especiall for suche as in grammer scholes doe reade moste eloquente poetes and oratours: whereunto is ioygned the oration which Cicero made to Cesar, geuing thankes vnto him for pardonyng, and restoring again of that noble ma[n] Marcus Marcellus, sette foorth by Richarde Sherrye Londonar.
author: Sherry, Richard, ca. 1506-ca. 1555.
publicationStmtDate: [the. iiii. daye of Maye, the yeare of oure Lorde. MDLV. [1555]]
